definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: lot (NH=BH; perh. As. loanword fr. puru, buru, stone Jen:ZA x. 339 f. and in Wild:Est p. 173 f.);—expl. by [[הַגּוֹרָל]] Es 3:7, Es 9:24; [[שֵׁם]] [[הַפּוּר]] v:Es 9:26 explains name of feast [[פּוּרִים]] v:Es 9:26; [[יְמֵי]] [[הַפֻּרִים]] days of Purim v:Es 9:28, v:Es 9:31; ´[[אִגֶּרֶת הַפּ]] v:Es 9:29, ´[[דִּבְרֵי הַפּ]] v:Es 9:32.—Vid. on Purim esp. Now:Arch. ii. 194 ff and reff.
